scripts.activemq: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml up -d --wait activemq
scripts.audit-log: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml up -d --wait audit-log-api
scripts.bichard-legacy: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml -f environment/docker-compose-bichard.yml up -d --wait nginx-auth-proxy
scripts.bichard-legacy-debug: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml -f environment/docker-compose-bichard-debug.yml up -d --wait nginx-auth-proxy
scripts.build:core: npm run build -w packages/common && npm run build -w packages/core && npm run build -w packages/conductor && npm run build -w packages/message-forwarder
scripts.build:api: npm run build -w packages/common && npm run build -w packages/api
scripts.build:ui: npm run build -w packages/common && npm run build -w packages/ui
scripts.build:e2e-test: npm run build -w packages/common && npm run build -w packages/e2e-test
scripts.build-message-forwarder:phase-1: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml build phase-1-message-forwarder
scripts.build-message-forwarder:phase-2: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml build phase-2-message-forwarder
scripts.build-worker: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml -f environment/docker-compose-worker.yml build worker
scripts.destroy: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml -f environment/docker-compose-worker.yml down -v
scripts.postgres: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml up -d --wait db-seed
scripts.localstack: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml up -d --wait localstack
scripts.mailserver: docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml up -d --wait mail
scripts.ui: npm run postgres && docker compose --project-name bichard -f environment/docker-compose.yml up -d --no-deps --wait nginx-auth-proxy user-service audit-log-api localstack activemq ui
